hh3cRCPMIB.name: hh3cRCPMIB
hh3cRCPMIB.contactinfo: Platform Team Hangzhou H3C Tech. Co., Ltd. Hai-Dian District Beijing P.R. China http://www.h3c.com Zip:100085
hh3cRCPMIB.description: The MIB module is used for managing RCP protocol server.

hh3cRCPServerEnableStatus.name: hh3cRCPServerEnableStatus
hh3cRCPServerEnableStatus.description: This attribute controls the system wide operation of RCP server. The value TRUE means that the RCP server is enabled. The value FALSE means that the RCP server is disabled.

hh3cRCPConnTimeout.name: hh3cRCPConnTimeout
hh3cRCPConnTimeout.description: Specifies the maximum time in seconds that a RCP client connection is idle.

hh3cRCPRuleTimeout.name: hh3cRCPRuleTimeout
hh3cRCPRuleTimeout.description: Specifies the time in seconds before a RCP rule is aged out. If its value is 0, it indicates RCP rule will not be aged out.

hh3cRCPServerMaxConn.name: hh3cRCPServerMaxConn
hh3cRCPServerMaxConn.description: Specifies the maximum number of clients that permitted to connect with RCP server at the same time.

hh3cRCPServerCurConn.name: hh3cRCPServerCurConn
hh3cRCPServerCurConn.description: The current actual number of clients that connecting with RCP server.

hh3cRCPConnTimeoutMaxValue.name: hh3cRCPConnTimeoutMaxValue
hh3cRCPConnTimeoutMaxValue.description: Specifies the maximum value of hh3cRCPConnTimeout.

hh3cRCPRuleTimeoutMaxValue.name: hh3cRCPRuleTimeoutMaxValue
hh3cRCPRuleTimeoutMaxValue.description: Specifies the maximum value of hh3cRCPRuleTimeout.

hh3cRCPServerMaxConnMaxValue.name: hh3cRCPServerMaxConnMaxValue
hh3cRCPServerMaxConnMaxValue.description: Specifies the maximum value of hh3cRCPServerMaxConn.

hh3cRCPBalanceGroupIdMinValue.name: hh3cRCPBalanceGroupIdMinValue
hh3cRCPBalanceGroupIdMinValue.description: Specifies the minimum value of balance group identity.

hh3cRCPBalanceGroupIdMaxValue.name: hh3cRCPBalanceGroupIdMaxValue
hh3cRCPBalanceGroupIdMaxValue.description: Specifies the maximum value of balance group identity.

hh3cRCPTotalUsers.name: hh3cRCPTotalUsers
hh3cRCPTotalUsers.description: Specifies the total number of RCP user.

hh3cRCPTotalClientIPs.name: hh3cRCPTotalClientIPs
hh3cRCPTotalClientIPs.description: Specifies the total number of RCP client IP.

hh3cRCPUserPassword.name: hh3cRCPUserPassword
hh3cRCPUserPassword.description: The password of RCP user. It is invisible to users and displayed as '***'.

hh3cRCPUserRedirectInterface.name: hh3cRCPUserRedirectInterface
hh3cRCPUserRedirectInterface.description: The redirect interface index of RCP user. The RCP rule assigned by the user can be associated with the redirect interface. If the redirect interface is invalid, its value is set to be 0.

hh3cRCPUserRedirectBalanceGroup.name: hh3cRCPUserRedirectBalanceGroup
hh3cRCPUserRedirectBalanceGroup.description: The redirect balance group identity of RCP user. The RCP rule assigned by the user can be associated with the redirect balance group. If the balance group is invalid, its value is set to be 0.

hh3cRCPUserRowStatus.name: hh3cRCPUserRowStatus
hh3cRCPUserRowStatus.description: This manages the creation and deletion of rows, and shows the current status of the indexed user name. This object has the following values. active(1) The indexed user name is configured on the device. notInService(2) Not Supported. notReady(3) Not Supported. createAndGo(4) Create a new user. createAndWait(5) Not Supported. destroy(6) Delete this entry. The associated entry can be modified when the value of hh3cRCPUserRowStatus is active(1). When deleting an inexistence entry, return noError.

hh3cRCPClientIPType.name: hh3cRCPClientIPType
hh3cRCPClientIPType.description: The IP address type (IPv4 or IPv6) of RCP client.

hh3cRCPClientIP.name: hh3cRCPClientIP
hh3cRCPClientIP.description: The IP address of RCP client.

hh3cRCPClientIPRowStatus.name: hh3cRCPClientIPRowStatus
hh3cRCPClientIPRowStatus.description: This manages the creation and deletion or rows, and shows the current status of the indexed client IP address. This object has the following values. active(1) The indexed client IP is configured on the device. notInService(2) Not Supported. notReady(3) Not Supported. createAndGo(4) Create a new client IP. createAndWait(5) Not Supported. destroy(6) Delete this entry. The associated entry can be modified when the value of hh3cRCPClientIPRowStatus is active(1). When deleting an inexistence entry, return noError.

hh3cRCPSessionClientIPType.name: hh3cRCPSessionClientIPType
hh3cRCPSessionClientIPType.description: The IP address type (IPv4 or IPv6) of RCP client.

hh3cRCPSessionRunningStatus.name: hh3cRCPSessionRunningStatus
hh3cRCPSessionRunningStatus.description: RCP server running status. It is one of the following status: connected: The connection is established and the RCP client is waiting for authentication. operational: The RCP client is authenticated and the server is ready for rule configuration request.
